kickstart.post: /sbin/chkconfig rabbitmq-server on /usr/lib/rabbitmq/bin/rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management admin_pass=$(< /dev/urandom tr -dc _A-Z-a-z-0-9 | head -c26) rabbitmqctl add_user rocks ${admin_pass} rabbitmqctl set_user_tags rocks administrator rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p / rocks ".*" ".*" ".*" echo ${admin_pass} > /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq.conf chmod 400 /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq.conf
